title: Cairns Self-Contained Apartment Stay Moments from the Esplanade with Outdoor Pool
description: Escape to the serene Trinity Bay and take in the stunning Cairns Lagoon and surrounding parklands from this self-contained apartment stay close to Cairns' best attractions. Just moments from the Esplanade, the vibrant culinary scene and night markets are at your fingertips. Relax on the pool deck, where refreshing sea breezes and picturesque vistas await, or retreat to your private balcony and watch the world go by.
offer_address: 60 Abbott Street, Cairns City, Queensland, 4870, Australia
